quoteText: We may also require you to provide additional Personal Data for verification purposes, including your date of birth, taxpayer or government identification number, or a copy of your government-issued identification.
title: Users are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.

tosdr.case: Users are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.
